ygData.subject: RE: Dual Wield curiosity question
ygData.msgSnippet: It is possible, but only acceptable for RP purposes.  There are not many decent special 1H blunts that have been found.  The ones that have are limited to
ygData.messageBody:
It is possible, but only acceptable for RP purposes. There are not many
decent special 1H blunts that have been found. The ones that have are
limited to clerics and casters and such. I understand why you would want an
ogre warrioress to use blunt and go "Ugh, you go squish!!" instead for
swish, swish, swish. There are also some 1h Axe's which might look good
with you character, so you might not want to rule out 1h slash all together.

Trent Carroll
Programmer
Houston Baptist University
(281) 649-3410

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lora Roa [mailto:loraroa@...]
> Sent: Sunday, July 18, 1999 10:19 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Dual Wield curiosity question
>
>
> From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
>
> I'll start off with the coment that *should* my character do this .. it
> would be for RP reasons ;) So skip any damage and delay analysis ...
>
> Has anyone tried dual-wield with two 1-H Blunts? Does it work?
>
> (i.e. Can it be done .. not is it the best set up).
>
> Bombom
> (who thinks she would be Swishswish if she dual wields slashing)
> Ogre Warrioress
> - current quest - find a spit, cut down on that kill to eat time ratio
> thing, its really annoying her.
>
>
